did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Ochirpureviin Sarantsatsral Papers, must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Ochirpureviin Sarantsatsral Papers, Ms2002-019 , Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Ochirpureviin Sarantsatsral Papers were donated in 2001.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The Ochirpureviin Sarantsatsral Papers were added to the IAWA Small Collections Ms2009-054 in September 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Ochirpureviin Sarantsatsral collection consists of a magazine Mongolian Construction, which features a shopping center by Sarantsatsral. Also included is a photograph of the project as well as a photograph of a model of a restaurant and photocopy of a master plan of a monastery.
Photograph and article about Margad shopping center, photograph of model, photocopy of master plan of monastery.
